review: I've had the Fire TV Stick for about a month.  It was very easy to set up and so far so good; works just as described each time I use it.  I could not be happier.  Should things change, I will update the review.  However, for now, it's a 5 star all the way.
author: SRS

review: now just need to be able to have more than one person use amazon music, 2 tvs using fire stick but only one can use amazon music at a time  frustrating
author: Jeanne Quirke

review: It is terrific...one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.  So easy to install/use.
author: Margaret Wright

review: Positively great! Easy to install/setup. A real bargain, especially if you're immersed in the Amazon universe.
author: C. Wilson "A Family Guy"

review: I love it! one of the best things I've done to save money.
author: Donna Armstrong
